resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157522</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1999</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Listening Strategies:Connectors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Strategies:Connectors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Strategies:Connectors D'Écoute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Strategies:Connectors Escutando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strategies:Connectors Ascoltante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακουσμα Strategies:Connectors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Strategies:Connectors Que escucha</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet where English students are taught to make correct use of connectors, which they may also encounter in listening comprehension exercises. Includes some translation to hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">connectors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, in dem englische 
Kursteilnehmer unterrichtet werden, korrekten Gebrauch von den 
Steckern zu bilden, die sie in hörenden Erfassenübungen auch 
antreffen können. Schließt irgendeine Übersetzung zum 
Hebräer ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau où des étudiants anglais sont 
enseignés à faire l'utilisation correcte des connecteurs, qu'ils 
peuvent également rencontrer dans des exercices d'écoute de 
compréhension. Inclut une certaine traduction à l'hébreu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha onde os estudantes ingleses 
sejam ensinados fazer o uso correto dos conectores, que podem também 
encontrar em exercícios escutando da compreensão. Inclui 
alguma tradução ao hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro in cui gli allievi 
inglesi sono insegnati fare l'uso corretto dei connettori, che possono
anche incontrare nelle esercitazioni ascoltanti di comprensione. 
Include una certa traduzione ad ebreo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας όπου οι αγγλικοί 
σπουδαστές διδάσκονται για να κάνουν τη σωστή χρήση των 
συνδέσμων, την οποία μπορούν επίσης να αντιμετωπίσουν στις 
ασκήσεις κατανόησης ακούσματος. Περιλαμβάνει κάποια 
μετάφραση στα εβραϊκά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo donde enseñan los 
estudiantes ingleses a hacer el uso correcto de los conectores, que 
pueden también encontrar en ejercicios de la comprensión que 
escuchan. Incluye una cierta traducción al hebreo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stecker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">connecteurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conectores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">connettori</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύνδεσμοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conectores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
